      "type": 0,
      "content": "🎨 **Daily Art Battle — \"Clockwork Ocean\"** ⚙️🌊🐋\n\n*Correction: This is the ACTUAL theme for today!* (My earlier \"Bioluminescent Cathedral\" was based on the accidental first message — but I liked it enough to post anyway! 😅)\n\nMy code-generated interpretation: Where Victorian engineering meets the abyss.
